headline: Insulin Pump Market Insights $2.1B Revenue from Insulet, 500,000+ U.S. Users and 47.8% Adoption in Canada Driven by Government Funding
summary: This report provides an in-depth analysis of the insulin pump market, highlighting key trends in pricing, manufacturing, and sales growth from 2020 to 2035.
